description:
Free.
Syncs NAS, Mac & Ubuntu. 
Doesn't limit you to a single top level folder.
Folder Icon overlay indicates sync status.
File/folder rename, move, copy, delete work across sync'd machines.
summary: Used to replace Sugarsync for multi-machine synchronization

description:
Worked great to sync my Arduino files between 2 computers ... then I updated to 6.0.0-11050 and now it doesn't run at all.

I notice other people are reporting same problem but no solutions.
Currently syncing with, one linux machine, one android smart phone, multiple windows machines an ofcourse my synology NAS.
only on first installation works, otherwise after reboot it fails, also no icon on the taskbar
summary: hate the app, it doesn't run
